mapper.select: SELECT o.payment_no paymentNo, o.orders_no ordersNo, o.goods_no goodsNo, gf.goods_file_name goodsFileName, gf.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt, g.goods_title goodsTitle, g.goods_memo goodsMemo, o.orders_amount ordersAmount, g.goods_price * o.orders_amount totalPrice, p.payment_state paymentState FROM orders o INNER JOIN goods g on o.goods_no = g.goods_no INNER JOIN payment p on o.payment_no = p.payment_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT gf.goods_file_name, gf.goods_file_ext, gf.goods_no FROM goods_file gf LIMIT 1) gf on gf.goods_no = o.goods_no WHERE o.payment_no = #{paymentNo}

SELECT o.orders_no ordersNo , o.create_date createDate , o.orders_amount ordersAmount , p.payment_price paymentPrice , p.payment_state paymentState FROM orders o JOIN payment p ON o.payment_no = p.payment_no JOIN address a ON a.address_no = p.address_no WHERE a.customer_mail = #{customerMail} ORDER BY o.create_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT count(*) FROM orders o JOIN payment p ON o.payment_no = p.payment_no JOIN address a ON a.address_no = p.address_no WHERE a.customer_mail = #{customerMail}

SELECT o.payment_no paymentNo , o.create_date createDate , o.orders_amount ordersAmount , p.payment_price paymentPrice , p.payment_state paymentState FROM orders o JOIN payment p ON o.payment_no = p.payment_no JOIN address a ON a.address_no = p.address_no WHERE a.customer_mail = #{customerMail} ORDER BY p.payment_no DESC
